title: Economy Week Ahead: Factories, Layoffs, Consumer Spending
sub_head: Surveys in the U.S., Europe are expected to indicate service-sector slowdowns amid new coronavirus restrictions
body:
Wednesday brings a full slate of economic data during a holiday-shortened week in the U.S.
MONDAY
Surveys of purchasing managers in the U.S. and Europe are expected to point to slowdowns in the dominant services sector following a surge in new coronavirus infections and a tightening of restrictions on households and businesses. In Europe,...
